unnormalised: Hey, loved these athlete bios! Really inspiring to read about folks like Mithali Raj breaking records. Remember "Chak De! India"? It's like that in real life!
normalised: Hey, loved these athlete bios! Really inspiring to read about folks like Mithali Raj breaking records. Remember "Chak De! India"? It is like that in real life!

unnormalised: I wish there were more stories about athletes from smaller places, like my village near Chennai. What about highlighting someone from IIT Madras's sports teams? Keep up the great work! More please!
normalised: I wish there were more stories about athletes from smaller places, like my village near Chennai. What about highlighting someone from I I T Madras's sports teams? Keep up the great work! More please!
